events.message: I just received my order and unfortunately the laptop screen has multiple scratches and some dead pixels. This is unacceptable.
The reported problem has been categorized under Product Defect due to screen scratches and dead pixels mentioned by the customer.
An agent has been assigned to handle the customer case regarding the defective laptop screen.
Hello! I’m sorry to hear about the issue with your laptop screen. I’m here to help you get this resolved as soon as possible.
Could you please provide photos of the scratches and dead pixels on the screen so we can better understand the extent of the damage?
I have attached several photos showing the scratches and dead pixels on the laptop screen as you requested.
Thank you for the photos. We can offer you a replacement laptop or a full refund. Please let us know which option you prefer.
I would prefer a replacement laptop instead of a refund. Please proceed with the exchange.
Your replacement request has been processed and a new laptop will be shipped to your address within 3 business days.
We hope your replacement laptop arrived in perfect condition. Please contact us if you encounter any further issues.
We are closing this case now as the replacement has been successfully delivered and no further issues were reported.
